Description: Papyrus; Hieratic literary text verso and recto. Late Egyptian Miscellanies.
Curator's comments: The so-called Papyrus Lansing is a New Egyptian 'Miscellany', or anthology of texts, praising the profession of the scribe, and it includes a eulogy of Wenmediamen's teacher. Published: A. H. Gardiner, Late Egyptian Miscellanies (Bibliotheca Aegyptiaca 7; Brussels: Fondation Egyptologique Reine Elisabeth 1937). R. Caminos, Late-Egyptian Miscellanies (Brown Egyptologicial Studies 1; London: Oxford University Press 1954). G. Moers, 'Der Papyrus Lansing. Der Lob des Schreiberberufes in einer ägyptischen Schülerhandschrift aus dem ausgehenden Neuen Reich', in O. Kaiser (ed), Texte aus der Um­welt des Alten Testaments. Ergänzungslieferung (Gütersloh: Gütersloher Verlagshaus 2001), 109-142.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381233) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381233)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: salt precipitate, displaced fragments Black ink Red ink Repaired: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: C Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: good
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Dr Gulian Lansing
